name: Futuristic Mech Robots Battle
description:
If you are ROBOT LOVER then it would be the best game for you named as Futuristic Mech Robots Battle. In this new era of technologies, you won't fight with men's or guns it would be held by TRANSFORMATION warrior BATTLEFIELD. It's gonna be the most dangerous war battlefield against the TERROR. The most thrilling, adventure & action game for teenager & who love futuristic warrior battlefield. It’s time to show your super ROBOTIC frontier fighting skills against powerful CLASH with the mech-bots. Use your power rightly & efficiently, Don't waste your target. Attack your enemy perfectly. Don’t let the injustice forces take control in your city. Put your best efforts and get ready to for an amazing MECH fighting experience. Be the real robot hero in the futuristic city!

You have a wide range of guns, PISTOL, RIFLE, SHOTGUN, RAILGUN, GRENADE LAUNCHER, HEAT SEEKER (ROCKET LAUNCHER), CLUSTER BOMB lasers, canons & missile. You have to kill your enemies, deadly mech warrior terror TARGET them kill all of them make peace in your futuristic city. Extensive 3D environments & a lot of missions with full of target shooting action adventurous & thrilling game will change how you look at mobile robo warrior games. This modern game is a thrilling action-packed FPS game that developed for the fans of robot shooting games.

You have to fight in 4 different, stunning environments. Every level is hard from the first your enemy is gonna be more powerful so you have to target them will more futuristic power, kill the mech terror. You can upgrade your robotic powers & gun too. Kill terror is the specific given time, show your robots warrior skills, be the real super robot hero of the futuristic city. You have to defeat them in this incredible conflict by the help of metal soldiers weapons, and see how you win this battle. Crime is everywhere by deadly robot criminals and modern munitions & weapons are limitless.


Main Features Futuristic Sniper Shooting - Robot mech war 2018
- Many battle robots with different strengths, and strategy.
- Many harmful weapon types, Pistol, Rifle, ShotGun, RailGun, GernadeLauncher, (Rocket Launcher)HeatSeeker, ClusterBomb lasers,
- Many possible combinations of robots & weapons.
- Four different environments with hard levels.
- Be the robotic hero in mech war.
